sourcesContent:
{{ruta}}
import { Component} from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router' @Component({ selector: 'app-inicio', templateUrl: './inicio.component.html', styleUrls: ['./inicio.component.css'] }) export class InicioComponent { ruta:string="" horarios:boolean=false; constructor(private router: Router ){ router.events.subscribe((val) => { if(this.ruta!=router.url){ let aux =router.url this.ruta=aux.at(1)?.toUpperCase()+ aux.substring(2) if(this.ruta=="Home"){ this.ruta="Información" }else if(this.ruta=="MisReservas"){ this.ruta="Mis reservas"; }else if(this.ruta=="Horarios"){ this.horarios=true; this.ruta="Contacto y Horarios"; } } }); } }
